meanings.definition: Having a strong or intoxicating effect
meanings.sent1: The headiest perfume filled the room with a sweet smell.
meanings.sent2: After drinking the headiest coffee, she felt wide awake.
meanings.sent3: The headiest cologne made everyone sneeze at the party.
meanings.sent4: The headiest spices in the dish transported her to a faraway land.
meanings.sent5: The headiest music at the concert made her want to dance all night.

meanings.sent1: His headiest decision was to study hard for the test.
meanings.sent2: The headiest student in the class always had the right answers.
meanings.sent3: The headiest squirrel cleverly found a way to reach the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: Her headiest move in the game surprised everyone with its brilliance.
meanings.sent5: The headiest detective quickly solved the mysterious case.

meanings.sent1: The headiest task of the day was to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent2: Her headiest possession was a family heirloom passed down for generations.
meanings.sent3: The headiest moment of the play brought tears to everyone's eyes.
meanings.sent4: His headiest dream was to travel the world and explore new cultures.
meanings.sent5: The headiest decision of her life was to start her own business.
